model.name: Txns
model.metadata: CREATE FOREIGN TABLE G1 (e1 string, e2 integer); CREATE FOREIGN TABLE G2 (e1 string, e2 integer);

model.name: View
model.metadata: CREATE VIRTUAL PROCEDURE g1Table(IN p1 integer, IN p2 string) RETURNS TABLE (xml_out xml) OPTIONS (UPDATECOUNT 0, "teiid_rest:METHOD" 'GET', "teiid_rest:URI" 'g1/{p1}') AS BEGIN SELECT XMLELEMENT(NAME "rows", XMLATTRIBUTES (g1Table.p1 as p1, g1Table.p2 as p2), XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(NAME "row", XMLFOREST(e1, e2)))) AS xml_out FROM Txns.G1; END
